gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 103, Heat 95
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Heat, 103-95. Kawhi Leonard recorded 25 points, 11 rebounds, and two blocks for the Clippers, with James Harden adding 21 points, 11 assists, and eight rebounds in the victory. Jimmy Butler tallied 21 points, four rebounds, and three assists for the Heat in the losing effort. The Clippers improve to 33-15, while the Heat fall to 26-24.
